oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An activity alert index for the detection of health disorders during early lactation
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Paudyal, Sushil
Maunsell, Fiona
Risco, Carlos
Donovan, G. Arthur
De Vries, Albert
Pinedo, Pablo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: early lactation
health disorders
monitoring
activity
animal behavior
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Monitoring of health disorders during early lactation is a key component in the management of dairy systems. Electronic systems that allow the monitoring of cow activity are available. Our objective was to evaluate the association between changes in activity (ACT) recorded by a neck collar and disease during early lactation in dairy cows.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2015; 282
